lead_paragraph: The Devils re-signed forward Scott Gomez to a one-year, $5 million contract yesterday, ending speculation that they would be unable to fit the 26-year-old Gomez’s contract under the salary cap. Gomez earned $2.2 million last season, when he set career bests for goals (33) and points (84) for the Devils.
